entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.0°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
